name: Bug Spell
description:
• Game engine: Unity 2D.
    • Sprites made in Photoshop CC.
    • Sound made by me and my mic.
    • Music made in ecrett music.

My learning goals for this game were: Warm up my game dev skills after recovering from surgery.  I wanted to do my first browser play game and found some great random dungeon tutorials that I was motivated to tackle.

I look forward to playing other’s games and leaving feedback, I hope I get some awesome constructive criticisms as well!

  • Feedback suggestions I'll try to add after voting.
    • Bosses
    • Enemies don't attack right away in new room
    • More variety in random rooms
    • Getting hit feedback (Maybe screen shake?)
